kapisīsa：，kapisīsaka m．[Sk．kapiśīrṣa] 門閂（門栓），木栓，戶樞 （門戶的轉軸）．
kapisīsa：，kapisīsaka m．[Sk．kapiśīrṣa] かんぬき，木栓，とぼそ．

kapisīsa： kapisīsa（na）
ကပိသီသ（န）
[kapi+sīsa]
[ကပိ+သီသ]
kapisīsa：[m．] the lintel of a door．

Kapisīsa，[Sk．kapiśīrṣa] the lintel of a door D．II，143 （cp．Rh．D．Buddh．Suttas p．95 n<sup>1</sup>） --°ka the cavity in a doorpost for receiving the bolt Vin．II，120，148 （cp．Vin．Texts II．106 n<sup>3</sup>）．（Page 187）

Kapisīsa：1．Kapisīsa．-A Tamil general subdued by Dutthagāmanī at Kacchatittha after a siege of four months．v．l．Kavisīsa．Mhv．xxv．12



2．Kapisīsa．-A minister of King Vatthagāmanī．One day when the king，accompanied by his queen，was going up the steps of the ākāsa-cetiya at Acchagalla-vihāra，he saw the minister，who had come down after the sweeping of the cetiya，sitting by the roadside．Because Kapisīsa failed to prostrate himself before the king，the latter slew him （Mhv．xxxiii．68f）．
KAPISĪSA：[m] cây đà ngang trên cửa

kapisīsa：ကပိ-သီသ （န）
တံခါးရွက်အပေါင်။ တံခါးကျည်။ တံခါးကျည်တပ်ရာတိုင်။
